comment: I cannot speak for how this professor is outside of online classes, but I do not recommend taking him online. Never clear with assignments. Does not communicate AT ALL. Grading makes zero sense. Makes you purchase his book, but fails to give correct page numbers for assignments. He leaves modules closed until the day or 2 before they are due.

He was extremely disorganized and unresponsive and would not open new modules on time and not extend the due date when that happened. I was very disappointed with him as a professor. Avoid if you can...
He is not responsive to emails. He is not tech savvy in the slightest and multiple times links needed to complete modules weren't even opened up on time. Do not recommend.
Absolutely cannot stand professors of classes about diversity/equality who expect broke & mostly marginalized students to buy the textbook THEY AUTHORED for over $100. Hypocritical & arrogant.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: He NEVER responds to emails in time. His work is always very confusing and doesnt make sense half the time and then he talks to you like youre a kid when you ask for clarification.

Dr. Glenn never responded to my emails and his assignments were always so hard to understand. He was very picky when it came to grading our assignments. I found this class really difficult & as a future teacher I was pretty disappointed.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader

comment: He is very harsh. If you can't take being talked down to because it is the most equitable way to sound then don't take his class. DO NOT HANDWRITE ANYTHING!!!!! You will get a zero for anything that is handwritten and there will be no exceptions even if you have to take you sick child who has a fever of a 105 to the urgent care.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Doesnt respond to emails, claims to care about diversity but only really does when it includes color (doesnt care about any other types), unclear grading, attitude problem, boring class with no structure other than reading, barely uploads grades, feel like I didnt learn anything even when I was still trying to learn new things.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--So many papers

comment: Aside from the class being a joke .... there are readings for every class meeting (along with an assignment to turn in). He rarely responded to my emails. If you miss class or turn in an assignment late for any reason, he does not make any exceptions or work with you. If you ask him a question before/after class he is condescending and intimidating
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Readings for every class meeting, never responds to email, unclear on grading system and doesn't give clear feedback that you can actually learn from, unreasonable about missing class for valid reasons, very belittling to students, randomly cancels class without telling anyone
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: This class thought me what kind of teacher I dont want to be. I recieved 100s on all but 4 assignments, two which I failed for being late, and two that were As. Dr. Glenn would not explain to me why I lost points on assignments that resulted in my receiving a B grade after I tried multiple times to simply understand why I lost them. V frustrated.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. Glenn seems like a nice teacher but he never responded to the most important emails I sent him which was extremely stressful. I did enjoy the learning aspect of the class but because it was online I dont feel like he did much teaching, it was more guidelines and students did everything else.

I emailed him about 4 times throughout the semester and only got a response to one that was a week and a half later. The actual assignments are graded pretty easily but it's just a lot and a lot of reading. I chose not to buy the textbook since I took it online over the summer and i was wrong Just unprofessional and hard to understand what he wants
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Dr. Glenn truly cares about his students, but his class won't be easy to pass. It will take a lot of reading and paying attention in class. If you go to class everyday and do your assigned reading you will pass with an A. There will be a lot of writing but it's easy A work if you pay attention in class.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: This is lecture heavy class and Glenn will spend 60 minutes out of an hour and fifteen-minute course talking about nothing. But if you do the readings and mention them in your papers, you will do well in class. Only recommend if you handle boredom well and need this class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This class can be really hard for some teachers to teach without forcing their beliefs onto their students, but Professor Glenn does it in a way that gives his students the material they need to be educated on the subjects and then leads them to forming their own beliefs on them. I highly recommend him if you want to get the most out of this class.
